verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%> For it is <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to our <S%H430>God;<s%> For it is <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> [and] <S%H8416>praise<s%> is <S%H5000>becoming.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1129>builds<s%> up <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> He <S%H3664>gathers<s%> the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
He <S%H7495>heals<s%> the <S%H7665>brokenhearted,<s%> <S%H3820><s%> And <S%H2280>binds<s%> up their <S%H6094>wounds.<s%>
He <S%H4487>counts<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3556>stars;<s%> He <S%H7121>gives<s%> <S%H8034>names<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> of them.
<S%H1419>Great<s%> is our <S%H136>Lord,<s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H3581>strength;<s%> His <S%H8394>understanding<s%> is <S%H369>infinite.<s%> <S%H4557><s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9388>supports<s%> the <S%H6035>afflicted;<s%> He <S%H8213>brings<s%> <S%H8213>down<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
<S%H9420>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving;<s%> <S%H2167>Sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to our <S%H430>God<s%> on the <S%H3658>lyre,<s%>

Who <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> with <S%H5645>clouds,<s%> Who <S%H3559>provides<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> for the <S%H776>earth,<s%> Who makes <S%H2682>grass<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gives<s%> to the <S%H929>beast<s%> its <S%H3899>food,<s%> [And] to the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6158>ravens<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H7121>cry.<s%>
He does not <S%H2654>delight<s%> in the <S%H1369>strength<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse;<s%> He does not <S%H7521>take<s%> <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H7785>legs<s%> of a <S%H376>man.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7521>favors<s%> those who <S%H3372>fear<s%> Him, Those who <S%H3176>wait<s%> for His <S%H2617>lovingkindness.<s%>
<S%H9576>Praise<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O <S%H3389>Jerusalem!<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> O <S%H6726>Zion!<s%>
For He has <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates;<s%> He has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> you.
He <S%H7760>makes<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in your <S%H1366>borders;<s%> He <S%H7646>satisfies<s%> you with the <S%H2459>finest<s%> of the <S%H2406>wheat.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sends<s%> forth His <S%H565>command<s%> to the <S%H776>earth;<s%> His <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7323>runs<s%> <S%H5704>very<s%> <S%H4120>swiftly.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H7950>snow<s%> like <S%H6785>wool;<s%> He <S%H6340>scatters<s%> the <S%H9214>frost<s%> like <S%H665>ashes.<s%>
He <S%H7993>casts<s%> forth His <S%H7140>ice<s%> as <S%H6595>fragments;<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> His <S%H7135>cold<s%>?
He <S%H7971>sends<s%> forth His <S%H1697>word<s%> and <S%H4529>melts<s%> them; He causes His <S%H7307>wind<s%> to <S%H5380>blow<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H5140>flow.<s%>
He <S%H5046>declares<s%> His <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> His <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and His <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

He has not <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> with <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1471>nation;<s%> And as for His <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> they have not <S%H3045>known<s%> them. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord!<s%>
